body_html: It's just another constraint added by keras and not a tensorflow issue. It's complaining that your custom loss function return something of a different shape. Using normal tensorflow optimizer with this custom loss will be fine. Or you can ask in keras issues or stackoverflow about how to do this in keras.

body: It's just another constraint added by keras and not a tensorflow issue. It's complaining that your custom loss function return something of a different shape. Using normal tensorflow optimizer with this custom loss will be fine. Or you can ask in keras issues or stackoverflow about how to do this in keras.
